com.facebook.zookeeper.connection

Interface ZkConnectionManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockZkConnectionManager, ZkConnectionManagerImpl

    public interface ZkConnectionManager
    The ZkConnectionManager initiates a connection to the ZooKeeper cluster at initialization time and maintains this connection until shutdown.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ZooKeeperIface getClient()
      Returns a valid ZooKeeperIface client that may be used to communicate with the ZooKeeper cluster.
      org.apache.zookeeper.ZooKeeper.States registerWatcher(org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher watcher)
      Registers an additional watcher to receive ZooKeeper connection event callbacks.
      void shutdown()
      Kills any active connections and shuts down the ZooKeeper connection manager.

    • Method Detail

        Registers an additional watcher to receive ZooKeeper connection event callbacks.
        Parameters:
        watcher -
        Returns:
        ZooKeeper state at the instant or just after the watch is set

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
              throws InterruptedException
        Kills any active connections and shuts down the ZooKeeper connection manager.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
